short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension allows using keyboard shortcuts on Viaplay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use your keyboard as a remote and control the Viaplay player in your Chrome browser. This extension enables keyboard shortcuts to be in control of the playback, so say goodbye to mouse clicking!

How does it work? It‚Äôs simple- use your keyboard arrows to:
- Rewind 15 seconds (left arrow)‚è™
- Fast forward 15 seconds (right arrow)‚è©
- Increase volume (up arrow)üîä
- Decrease volume (down arrow)ü§´
- Go fullscreen (f key)

All you need to do is add the Viaplay Hotkeys extension to your browser, enable the keyboard shortcuts using a built-in toggle and control the Viaplay player without any clicks. It's as simple as that!
